Types

Clip ¶
Source

Clip :: enum u32 {
	NONE, 
	PART, 
	ALL, 
}

Color ¶
Source

Color :: struct {
	r,
	g,
	b,
	a: u8,
}

Color_Type ¶
Source

Color_Type :: enum u32 {
	TEXT, 
	BORDER, 
	WINDOW_BG, 
	TITLE_BG, 
	TITLE_TEXT, 
	PANEL_BG, 
	BUTTON, 
	BUTTON_HOVER = 7, 
	BUTTON_FOCUS = 8, 
	BASE, 
	BASE_HOVER   = 10, 
	BASE_FOCUS   = 11, 
	SCROLL_BASE, 
	SCROLL_THUMB, 
}

Command_Jump ¶
Source

Command_Jump :: struct {
	command: Command,
	dst:     rawptr,
}

Command ¶
Source

Command :: struct {
	variant: Command_Variant,
	size:    i32,
}

Command_Clip ¶
Source

Command_Clip :: struct {
	command: Command,
	rect:    Rect,
}

Command_Icon ¶
Source

Command_Icon :: struct {
	command: Command,
	rect:    Rect,
	id:      Icon,
	color:   Color,
}

Command_Rect ¶
Source

Command_Rect :: struct {
	command: Command,
	rect:    Rect,
	color:   Color,
}

Command_Text ¶
Source

Command_Text :: struct {
	command: Command,
	font:    Font,
	pos:     Vec2,
	color:   Color,
	str:     string,
}

Command_Variant ¶
Source

Command_Variant :: union {
	^Command_Jump, 
	^Command_Clip, 
	^Command_Rect, 
	^Command_Text, 
	^Command_Icon, 
}

Container ¶
Source

Container :: struct {
	head,
	tail:         ^Command,
	rect,
	body:         Rect,
	content_size: Vec2,
	scroll:       Vec2,
	zindex:       i32,
	open:         b32,
}

Context ¶
Source

Context :: struct {
	text_width:          proc(font: Font, text: string) -> (width: i32),
	text_height:         proc(font: Font) -> i32,
	draw_frame:          proc(ctx: ^Context, rect: Rect, colorid: Color_Type),
	_style:              Style,
	style:               ^Style,
	hover_id,
	focus_id,
	last_id:             Id,
	last_rect:           Rect,
	last_zindex:         i32,
	updated_focus:       b32,
	frame:               Frame_Index,
	hover_root,
	next_hover_root:     ^Container,
	scroll_target:       ^Container,
	number_edit_buf:     [127]u8,
	number_edit_len:     int,
	number_edit_id:      Id,
	command_list:        Stack(u8, COMMAND_LIST_SIZE),
	root_list:           Stack(^Container, ROOT_LIST_SIZE),
	container_stack:     Stack(^Container, ROOT_LIST_SIZE),
	clip_stack:          Stack(Rect, CLIP_STACK_SIZE),
	id_stack:            Stack(Id, ID_STACK_SIZE),
	layout_stack:        Stack(Layout, LAYOUT_STACK_SIZE),
	container_pool:      [48]Pool_Item,
	containers:          [48]Container,
	treenode_pool:       [48]Pool_Item,
	mouse_pos,
	last_mouse_pos:      Vec2,
	mouse_delta,
	scroll_delta:        Vec2,
	mouse_down_bits:     Mouse_Set,
	mouse_pressed_bits:  Mouse_Set,
	mouse_released_bits: Mouse_Set,
	key_down_bits,
	key_pressed_bits:    Key_Set,
	_text_store:         [1024]u8,
	text_input:          strings.Builder,
}

Font ¶
Source

Font :: distinct rawptr

Frame_Index ¶
Source

Frame_Index :: distinct i32

Icon ¶
Source

Icon :: enum u32 {
	NONE, 
	CLOSE, 
	CHECK, 
	COLLAPSED, 
	EXPANDED, 
	RESIZE, 
}

Id ¶
Source

Id :: distinct u32

Key_Set ¶
Source

Key_Set :: distinct bit_set[Key; u32]

Key ¶
Source

Key :: enum u32 {
	SHIFT, 
	CTRL, 
	ALT, 
	BACKSPACE, 
	RETURN, 
}

Layout ¶
Source

Layout :: struct {
	body,
	next:       Rect,
	position,
	size,
	max:        Vec2,
	widths:     [16]i32,
	items,
	item_index,
	next_row:   i32,
	next_type:  Layout_Type,
	indent:     i32,
}

Layout_Type ¶
Source

Layout_Type :: enum int {
	NONE     = 0, 
	RELATIVE = 1, 
	ABSOLUTE = 2, 
}

Mouse ¶
Source

Mouse :: enum u32 {
	LEFT, 
	RIGHT, 
	MIDDLE, 
}

Mouse_Set ¶
Source

Mouse_Set :: distinct bit_set[Mouse; u32]

Opt ¶
Source

Opt :: enum u32 {
	ALIGN_CENTER, 
	ALIGN_RIGHT, 
	NO_INTERACT, 
	NO_FRAME, 
	NO_RESIZE, 
	NO_SCROLL, 
	NO_CLOSE, 
	NO_TITLE, 
	HOLD_FOCUS, 
	AUTO_SIZE, 
	POPUP, 
	CLOSED, 
	EXPANDED, 
}

Options ¶
Source

Options :: distinct bit_set[Opt; u32]

Pool_Item ¶
Source

Pool_Item :: struct {
	id:          Id,
	last_update: Frame_Index,
}

Real ¶
Source

Real :: f32

Rect ¶
Source

Rect :: struct {
	x,
	y,
	w,
	h: i32,
}

Result ¶
Source

Result :: enum u32 {
	ACTIVE, 
	SUBMIT, 
	CHANGE, 
}

Result_Set ¶
Source

Result_Set :: bit_set[Result; u32]

Stack ¶
Source

Stack :: struct {}

Style ¶
Source

Style :: struct {
	font:           Font,
	size:           Vec2,
	padding:        i32,
	spacing:        i32,
	indent:         i32,
	title_height:   i32,
	footer_height:  i32,
	scrollbar_size: i32,
	thumb_size:     i32,
	colors:         [Color_Type]Color,
}

Vec2 ¶
Source

Vec2 :: distinct [2]i32
